page.description: Dynamically sets the template for a freeform List control and populates the List with data.

argument.name: listName
argument.description: The ID of the List Control.

argument.name: data
argument.description: A JSON object defining the data used to populate the List.

argument.name: template
argument.description: The template for the List. The template can use client-side template syntax.

discussion.p: This method is a special form of the more general [{dialog.object}.setListColumnsAndPopulate].
